title: NuLLeDbudy
author: NuLLeDbudy
content: https://youtu.be/uKAW2K-z4WQIs this legit and if so how does it work? I’ve been studying JavaScript injection techniques and I found this on YouTube… looks legit but I dunno Wanting another opinion

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: Looks like a complete scam to me. Avoid cheap looking things, you may end up getting malware to your browser or PC by trying to execute random scripts. Worse still, your Bitcoin could be stolen.

comments.author: Churchillvv
comments.body: Quote from: NuLLeDbudy on August 01, 2023, 11:33:46 PMIs this legit and if so how does it work? I’ve been studying JavaScript injection techniques and I found this on YouTube… looks legit but I dunno Firstly I think this post should be directed to other boards like wallet software were experts on software functioning can quickly help out. And from my findings this Exodus wallet is a red flag for saving your Bitcoin base on conversation I have reviewed, issues of missing funds, expensive charges etc are always talked about.Quote Wanting another opinion External wallet would be my own opinion because it's reliable and safe.

comments.author: mich
comments.body: No I did not see this video before. But this does look like it is a scam for me and I will never do something like it. No free gift cards no free bitcoin no free crypto vouchers it is just not for real.
